content: > please note that while this pattern is listed as $1 50 - you do not have to pay for it there is a free version as well on my website if you choose to pay for the pdf you will be supporting a brand new designer in her journey i appreciate your support whether you pay for the pattern or simply use the free version when i asked my mom what she wanted for christmas last year she specially requested pillow cases for her couch the result is the hourglass bobble pillow this pattern is written out with a chart at the last page for those who prefer charts the gauge is not extremely important my pillows were a little chubby so they fit well into the insert but you can size up or down on your hook to make adjustments as needed
